entities.name: OUR
entities.description: The company or entity that is the subject of the text, likely a technology company dealing with hardware and software products.

entities.name: OEMs
entities.description: Original Equipment Manufacturers who integrate the company's device into their products.

entities.name: ODMs
entities.description: Original Design Manufacturers who integrate the company's device into their products.

entities.name: AIBs
entities.description: Add-In Board manufacturers who integrate the company's device into their products.

entities.name: TIER 1 AUTOMOTIVE SUPPLIERS
entities.description: Top-level suppliers in the automotive industry who integrate the company's device into their products.

relationships.relationship_description: OEMs integrate the company's device into their products
